Articles.Content: You must have either Blue Hawk Industries or NKD and Kerbin side and KK installed to participate. The rules are MAD (mutually assured destruction). The base must be completely or rendered inoperational to be counted. Two missile launches per round and reverting flight on the launch pad will be counted as a launch. All type of craft are permitted.
